title: How to Make Vegan Chili

steps.headline: Soak the beans overnight in a large bowl in the mixture of vegetable broth and salted water.
Drain the beans, while setting 3 cups of the liquid aside.
Preheat your over to 400 °F (204 °C) and set aside a baking sheet.
Season the roasting vegetables by combining all the ingredients specified in the roast vegetables ingredients list.
Spread out on a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 30 minutes.
Take the vegetables out of the oven and set aside, but do not turn the oven off yet.
Heat the protein ingredients together in a large pot at a high temperature.
steps.description: Reduce to a simmer after 4 minutes, then cover and simmer for an additional 20 minutes.

steps.headline: Place the protein ingredients on the baking sheet and roast in the oven for 20 minutes.
Remove the second batch of roasted ingredients from the oven and combine them in a large pot with the drained beans.
Add 1 to 2 cups of the reserved soaking liquid, depending on how tender the beans are.
Cover and simmer on low heat until tomato base has been prepared (see below).
Prepare all of the necessary ingredients.
Boil the tomato base ingredients specified in the tomato base ingredients section uncovered in a medium sized sauce pot, then simmer for 15 minutes.
Add the tomato base ingredients and the protein ingredients to the pot with the beans and vegetables.
steps.description: Simmer together for about an hour.

steps.headline: Serve in bowls with vegan sour cream, pumpkin seeds, chopped parsley, and crushed peanuts.

text: Prepare the Beans Soak the beans overnight in a large bowl in the mixture of vegetable broth and salted water.  Drain the beans, while setting 3 cups of the liquid aside.  Roast the Vegetables Preheat your over to 400 °F (204 °C) and set aside a baking sheet.  Season the roasting vegetables by combining all the ingredients specified in the roast vegetables ingredients list.  Spread out on a baking sheet and roast in the oven for 30 minutes.  Take the vegetables out of the oven and set aside, but do not turn the oven off yet.  Prepare the Protein Ingredients Heat the protein ingredients together in a large pot at a high temperature. Reduce to a simmer after 4 minutes, then cover and simmer for an additional 20 minutes. Place the protein ingredients on the baking sheet and roast in the oven for 20 minutes.  Combining the Components Remove the second batch of roasted ingredients from the oven and combine them in a large pot with the drained beans.  Add 1 to 2 cups of the reserved soaking liquid, depending on how tender the beans are.  Cover and simmer on low heat until tomato base has been prepared (see below).  Prepare the Tomato Base Prepare all of the necessary ingredients.  Boil the tomato base ingredients specified in the tomato base ingredients section uncovered in a medium sized sauce pot, then simmer for 15 minutes.  Add Everything Together and Serve Add the tomato base ingredients and the protein ingredients to the pot with the beans and vegetables. Simmer together for about an hour. Serve in bowls with vegan sour cream, pumpkin seeds, chopped parsley, and crushed peanuts.
